languages.text: "Кхе-кхе... Слава вашему благородию и трижды хвала! Мы это... правда вам очень, очень благодарны! Ни я, ни внучки уже наверное и {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}живы бы без вас не были{/d}... Эй, Арильд, шевели костьми, поприветствуй {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость!"

"Ahem... Glory to Your thrice-praised {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, er... very, very grateful to you, we really are! Neither I nor my grandchildren would've probably been {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}alive now if not for you{/d}... Oi! Aryld! Move your old bones! Get over here and greet {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship!"
languages.original_text: "Кхе-кхе... Слава вашему благородию и трижды хвала! Мы это... правда вам очень, очень благодарны! Ни я, ни внучки уже наверное и {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}живы бы без вас не были{/d}... Эй, Арильд, шевели костьми, поприветствуй {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость!"

Get over here and greet {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship!"

languages.text: "Ähem ... Ehre Eurer dreifach gepriesenen {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Wir sind, äh ... Euch sehr, sehr dankbar, wirklich! Weder ich noch meine Enkel wären {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}ohne Euch noch am Leben{/d} ... Oi! Aryld! Beweg deine alten Knochen! Komm her und begrüße {mf|seine Lord|ihre Lady}schaft!"
languages.original_text: "Ahem... Glory to Your thrice-praised {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, er... very, very grateful to you, we really are! Neither I nor my grandchildren would've probably been {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}alive now if not for you{/d}... Oi! Aryld! Move your old bones! Get over here and greet {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: "Ähem ... Ehre Eurer dreifach gepriesenen {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Wir sind, äh ... Euch sehr, sehr dankbar, wirklich! Weder ich noch meine Enkel wären ohne Euch noch am Leben ... Oi! Aryld! Beweg deine alten Knochen! Komm her und begrüße {mf|seine Lord|ihre Lady}schaft!"

languages.text: « Hum... Gloire à votre Seigneurie trois fois louée ! Nous vous sommes, euh... très très reconnaissants, vraiment ! Sans vous, mes petits-enfants et moi {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}ne serions probablement plus de ce monde{/d}... Eh ! Aryld ! Ramène ta vieille carcasse par ici ! Viens saluer Sa Seigneurie ! »
languages.original_text: "Ahem... Glory to Your thrice-praised {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, er... very, very grateful to you, we really are! Neither I nor my grandchildren would've probably been {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}alive now if not for you{/d}... Oi! Aryld! Move your old bones! Get over here and greet {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: « Ahem... Gloire à votre Seigneurie trois fois louée ! Nous vous sommes, euh... très très reconnaissants, vraiment ! Sans vous, mes petits-enfants et moi ne serions probablement plus de ce monde... Eh ! Aryld ! Ramène ta vieille carcasse par ici ! Viens saluer Sa Seigneurie ! »

languages.text: “咳咳……荣耀归于您，无比尊贵的大人！我们，呃……非常非常感谢您，真的！{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}如果不是您{/d}，我和我的孙子们可能都活不到现在……哦！艾瑞德！你这把老骨头快点！快过来，给大人打招呼。”
languages.original_text: "Ahem... Glory to Your thrice-praised {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, er... very, very grateful to you, we really are! Neither I nor my grandchildren would've probably been {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}alive now if not for you{/d}... Oi! Aryld! Move your old bones! Get over here and greet {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: “咳咳……荣耀归于您，无比尊贵的大人！我们，呃……非常非常感谢您，真的！如果不是您，我和我的孙子们可能都活不到现在……哦！艾瑞德！你这把老骨头快点！快过来，给大人打招呼。”

languages.text: 「ゴホン…三重に称賛されるべき陛下に栄光あれ！私たちは、その…すごくすごく感謝しています。本当ですとも！あなた様がいなければ、私も孫達も今頃、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}生きておりません{/d}…ちょっと！アリルド！その老いぼれた骨を動かすんだよ！こっちに来て、陛下にご挨拶して！」
languages.original_text: "Ahem... Glory to Your thrice-praised {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, er... very, very grateful to you, we really are! Neither I nor my grandchildren would've probably been {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}alive now if not for you{/d}... Oi! Aryld! Move your old bones! Get over here and greet {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: 「ゴホン…三重に称賛されるべき陛下に栄光あれ！私たちは、その…すごくすごく感謝しています。本当ですとも！あなた様がいなければ、私も孫達も今頃、生きておりません…ちょっと！アリルド！その老いぼれた骨を動かすんだよ！こっちに来て、陛下にご挨拶して！」

languages.text: «Ejem... ¡Gloria a{mf|l| la} tres veces {mf|alabado|alabada}! Estamos... muy, muy agradecidos, ¡de verdad! Es probable que ni yo ni mis nietos estuviéramos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}vivos si no fuera por usted{/d}... ¡Oye! ¡Aryld! ¡Mueve ese anciano trasero! ¡Ven aquí y saludad!».
languages.original_text: "Ahem... Glory to Your thrice-praised {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, er... very, very grateful to you, we really are! Neither I nor my grandchildren would've probably been {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}alive now if not for you{/d}... Oi! Aryld! Move your old bones! Get over here and greet {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: «Ejem... ¡Gloria a{mf|l| la} tres veces {mf|alabado|alabada}! Estamos... muy, muy agradecidos, ¡de verdad! Es probable que ni yo ni mis nietos estuviéramos vivos si no fuera por usted... ¡Oye! ¡Aryld! ¡Mueve ese anciano trasero! ¡Ven aquí y saludad!».

languages.text: "Öhö... Sevgili {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri çok yaşa! Biz, şey... Size çok ama çok minnettarız! İmparator sizden razı olsun! {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}Siz olmasaydınız ne ben ne de torunlarım hayatta olurduk{/d}... Hey! Aryld! Hımbıllık etme de gelip {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni selamla!"
languages.original_text: "Ahem... Glory to Your thrice-praised {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, er... very, very grateful to you, we really are! Neither I nor my grandchildren would've probably been {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_OldPeopleSurvived}alive now if not for you{/d}... Oi! Aryld! Move your old bones! Get over here and greet {mf|His Lord|Her Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: "Öhöm... Sevgili {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri çok yaşa! Biz şey... Size cidden minnettarız! Siz olmasanız ne ben ne de torunlarım hayatta olurdu... Hey! Aryld! Bırak tembelliği ve gelip {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni selamla!"
